trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关与委托一起处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> event of the toolbar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog opened.
trans-unit.target: 上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick>事件工具栏上，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs>计算的值，并打开适当的对话框。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> have been instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 此代码假定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>已实例化。
